results.name: Number of iterations of A049820(x) = x - A000005(x) needed to reach a square, when starting from x = n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16384
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 1..110880
formula: If A010052(n) == 1 [when n is in A000290], then a(n) = 0, otherwise a(n) = 1+a(A049820(n)).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 05 2019
